Chapter 2
=========

Introduction
-------------

This is the second chapter of the documentation. In this chapter, we will discuss the `calculateSum` function from the `math_module`.

Section 1: Function Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `calculateSum` function is a part of the `math_module`. It takes two integer parameters and returns their sum.

.. code-block:: python

   def calculateSum(a, b):
       """Calculate the sum of two integers."""
       return a + b

Section 2: Function Usage
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Here is an example of how to use the `calculateSum` function:

.. code-block:: python

   from math_module import calculateSum

   result = calculateSum(5, 3)
   print(result)  # Outputs: 8

Conclusion
----------

This concludes Chapter 2. We discussed the `calculateSum` function from the `math_module`, including its description and usage.
